alert.note: Alert for Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 10:39PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THAYER COUNTY THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1039 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mahaska to near Hebron to near Byron. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hebron, Deshler, and Gilead around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Belvidere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
